name: The Ashes
description: The Ashes is a cricket game where you lead England or Australia in the legendary Ashes series

name: Commando 2
description: Commando 2 is a side-scrolling action game where you fight your way through hordes of enemies as a soldier

name: 3 Foot Ninja
description: 3 Foot Ninja is an action-adventure game where you play as a tiny ninja warrior, who is a skilled combatant that utilizes his sword and throwing stars (shurikens) to battle enemies

name: 3 Foot Ninja II
description: 3 Foot Ninja II is an action platformer where you control a tiny ninja warrior on a quest to save a princess from evil forces

name: Stan Skates
description: Stan Skates is a retro skateboarding game where you play as Stan, who skateboards through the city

name: Alien Clones
description: Alien Clones is a fast-paced side-scrolling shooter where you battle waves of aliens

name: Mission Mars
description: Mission Mars is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up game where you pilot a red UFO and destroy buildings on Mars

name: Penguin Push
description: Penguin Push is a puzzle game where you use a penguin to push boxes on an ice field

name: Reel Gold
description: Reel Gold is a side-scrolling mining game where you control a miner in a mine cart

name: Rigelian Hot Shots
description: Rigelian Hot Shots is an arcade game where you control a fireball with a tail

name: Samurai Warrior
description: Samurai Warrior is a fighting game where you choose from a variety of Samurai warriors to battle against AI opponents or other players

name: Park-A-Lot
description: Park-A-Lot is a car parking game where you maneuver vehicles into designated parking spots

name: Trapshoot
description: Trapshoot is a casual shooting game where you shoot clay pigeons, chickens, and even beer cans out of the sky

name: Battleships General Quarters
description: Battleships General Quarters 2 is a turn-based strategy game where you take command of a fleet and battle an opponent on a grid-based battlefield

name: Bob The Robber
description: Bob The Robber is a puzzle platformer game where you play as Bob, a thief trying to steal loot from various houses

name: Fancy Pants Adventure
description: Fancy Pants Adventure is a platformer game where you control a stick figure character with baggy pants

name: Bubble Shooter
description: Bubble Shooter is a puzzle game where you shoot colored bubbles to match three or more of the same color

name: Samurai Jack: Code of the Samurai
description: Samurai Jack: Code of the Samurai is a side-scrolling action game where you play as Samurai Jack, a samurai warrior on a quest to defeat the evil Aku

name: Cat Ninja
description: Cat Ninja is a tile-based action puzzle game where you control a nimble cat ninja

name: Flash Tetris
description: Flash Tetris is a classic puzzle game where you arrange falling blocks to create complete lines

name: Henry Stickmin: Breaking the Bank
description: Henry Stickmin: Breaking the Bank is a point-and-click adventure game where you help Henry Stickmin pull off a bank heist

name: Henry Stickmin: Escaping the Prison
description: Henry Stickmin: Escaping the Prison is a point-and-click adventure game where you help Henry Stickmin escape from a high-security prison

name: Henry Stickmin: Fleeing the Complex
description: Henry Stickmin: Fleeing the Complex is a point-and-click adventure game where you help Henry Stickmin escape from a high-security complex

name: Henry Stickmin: Infiltrating the Airship
description: Henry Stickmin: Infiltrating the Airship is a point-and-click adventure game where you help Henry Stickmin infiltrate an airship

name: Pacman
description: Pacman is a classic arcade game where you control Pacman, a yellow circle that eats dots while avoiding ghosts

name: Chasm
description: Chasm is a platformer game where you control a character who explores a series of caves and tunnels

name: Cannon Blast
description: Cannon Blast is a casual shooting game where you shoot cannonballs at pirate ships

name: Cheese Hunt
description: Cheese Hunt is a puzzle game where you help a mouse collect cheese while avoiding traps

name: Heli Attack 2
description: Heli Attack 2 is a side-scrolling shooter where you battle helicopters

name: ChalkZone: Double Trouble
description: ChalkZone: Double Trouble is a platformer game where you control Rudy and Penny as they explore the ChalkZone
